mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) FROM Card_Transactions WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND transaction_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT merchant_category) FROM Card_Transactions WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND transaction_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND merchant_category NOT IN ('food', 'transport', 'living', 'fixcost')

SELECT COALESCE(STDDEV(weekly_total), 0) FROM ( SELECT YEARWEEK(transaction_date) AS week_key, SUM(amount) AS weekly_total FROM Card_Transactions WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND transaction_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY week_key ) AS weekly_data
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Card_Transactions WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND transaction_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT merchant_category) FROM Card_Transactions WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND transaction_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
SELECT COALESCE(AVG(sp.max_rate), 0) FROM User_Savings us JOIN Savings_Product sp ON us.product_id = sp.product_id WHERE us.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_goal WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 'PUBLISHED'
SELECT COALESCE(AVG(progress_rate), 0) FROM user_goal WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 'PUBLISHED'
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(monthly_save_amount), 0) FROM user_goal WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 'PUBLISHED' AND monthly_save_amount > 0
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(monthly_payment), 0) FROM User_Savings WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND monthly_payment > 0

SELECT COALESCE(STDDEV(monthly_total), 0) FROM ( SELECT SUM(amount) AS monthly_total FROM Summaries_Cache WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND period_type = 'monthly' AND date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH) GROUP BY yearMonth ) AS monthly_data

SELECT COALESCE(AVG(monthly_total), 0) FROM ( SELECT SUM(amount) AS monthly_total FROM Summaries_Cache WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND period_type = 'monthly' AND date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH) GROUP BY yearMonth ) AS monthly_data
